name: Untitled Dungeon Game (xprees5)
description:
Untitled Dungeon Game

Explore the dungeon and its mysteries. Look for hidden Artifacts and Key-Stones to unlock The Door! 

But be aware of the dangers. Lava and traps will not be a problem for experienced adventurers, but dungeon guards are tough to overcome. It's better to keep out of their sight, don't make a noise, or you can try to lure them away with coins they might help you.

Are you too loud or slow? 
Collect Artifact shards and craft Artifacts in Magicsmith and use them to boost your skills and beat the dungeon.

We* developed this game as a semestral project in a team of three.

We* - RealTime Entropy (Ondra, Vojta, Vašek)

Let us know how you liked it in the comments!
